title: Ok wtf
body: so.. trying to play a game of ranked right? it just dies saying that pvp network has been disconnected. i also get a ban for this. My wifi is healthy and said a bunch of errors and stuff. Please fix this.

replies.body:
While WiFi is *convenient*, it can often cause disconnections, inconsistent latency, and other issues while playing League. We actually did an article on comparing WiFi vs Ethernet [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ethernet-vs-wifi-ping-packets-playing-better). 

We've consolidated a lot of common solutions for this issue in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), one of them being switching to a wired connection. I recommend you give it a peek and see if any of those steps work for you.

Let me know how it goes.
